block.title: ZAProxy Configuration
block.text: Configure the connection to your OWASP ZAP instance. These settings are required for the app to collect data.

input.label: ZAP Base URL
input.help: Base URL of the ZAP instance (for example: https://zap.example.internal:8080)

input.label: ZAP API Key
input.help: API key used to authenticate to the ZAP API. This value is stored securely by Splunk.

input.label: Verify SSL Certificates
input.help: Disable only if using self-signed certificates.
